task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 33°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I can see most of the building, but to accurately estimate its height, I need to look up to ensure I can see the very top of the structure.
I can now see the top of the building, and from the previous view I saw the bottom, so I can count the floors to estimate the total height.
